original_title: Sanath Jayasuriya appointed as Cricket Consultant
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Sri Lanka Cricket Captain Sanath Jayasuriya has been appointed as a Cricket Consultant for SLC.
Sri Lanka Cricket said that Jayasuriya will be overseeing all teams that attend the SLC High Performance Center.
Galle Literary Festival returns in 2024 with star-studded lineup and fresh vision
